Someone should let Kermit know he has a new relative.
A new species of frog has been found in Costa Rica.
...the lime-colored amphibian has translucent skin on its underside...
...and has an eye that makes it look like the famous Muppet Kermit.
The frog's translucent belly makes its internal organs easy to see,...
...but those big, white eyes with perfect black centers...
